Bibliographic References: PP, no. 249, pi. 30 b; PPSupp, no. 339; CVA 2, IV F, pi. 1, 10; SchneiderNon SepcifiedHerrmann, BABesch 51, 1976, p. 74, fig. 4.
Imagery Description: (a) Papposilen, playing the flute and moving to 1., followed by Dionysos with wreath and thyrsus in r. hand, 'skewer of fruit' in 1., (b) Al + A2, with sprays.
